title: [Major] Champion Select Erroneous Summoners Selection bug
body:
So, I was in champ select. Noticed summoners made noises when you selected them, played with them a bit in awe, then selected Flash + Heal. A dodge occurs, and I still have Flash + Heal selected below my Champions/Skins page, but on the left side it shows I have Smite + Heal. This confused me, as did my team mates, and I switched to Flash + Heal again just to double check. The left side remained Smite + Heal, but I figured maybe it was just a visual bug.

Match starts, and I still have Smite + Heal selected after all. This, in turn, causes two of my team mates to flame me and accuse me of being a troll, as well as the enemy team questioning if I was trolling. I wasn't, of course, match proceeds and I prove I'm not trolling it was just an awful mistake and bug. I don't know if the dodge had anything to do with this, but switching summoners did not give me Heal + Flash as I had intended.

Riot pls? :( Kateykhaos?

replies.body:
Heyo Frozen Beauty,

Sorry for the delay on this - are you still having issues with this?
Well, it only happened once but it ruined that match for me. I haven't messed around with summoners when dodges occur since, however. I wish I took a screenshot so you could see. ><
I can catch up with the team working on the new champion select and make sure they're aware of the issue.
I have been having similar visual bugs with summoners from dodges. However, none in game bugs from prior visual lobby bugs.

There seems to be lag when it comes to locking in a champion for ban or pick. either server communication is off, (because i get a message after the dodge) or there are still bugs with the system itself. This may explain a good percentage of the increase in game dodging over the past couple of days. many people who have this problem also are reporting no lag in the actual game (like myself, my ping only jumps between 69-78). It seems also that when banning or locking in if you do so in within the last 10 seconds, chances are you are gonna fail the lock in and forced to dodge. This is a problem because many players use the time to discuss strategy or champion bans. Is Riot aware of this issue? the notification i receive looks like this. http://imgur.com/ufVt5yv Also if i could get back the 9lp i lost to this bug that would be great. Lost time is lost time so I know I wont get that back, but if this issue gets fixed then I can actually play the game again so that would be enough for me.
